title: Albert Wenger, Union Square Ventures Partner
description:
In an episode that originally aired on Recode Decode, Union Square Ventures partner Albert Wenger talks with Peter Kafka about bubble anxiety, mission-driven "benefit corporations" and why tech companies should be willing to work with the government to stop crime and terrorism.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
